views.ui_expr:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Reconciliation Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationId,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        value: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
            text: if(
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationId] < 100000,
              text(
                fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationId],
                "#00000"
              ),
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationId]
            ),
            link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
              recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD,
              identifier: fv!identifier
            ),
            linkStyle: "STANDALONE"
          )
        }
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Gsm Reconciliation Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.gsmReconciliationId,
      value: a!defaultValue(
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.gsmReconciliationId],
      "–"
    ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Status",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.status,
      value: a!defaultValue(
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.status],
      "–"
    )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Message",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.message,
      value: a!defaultValue(
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.message],
      "–"
    )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Current Iteration Count",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.currentIterationCount,
      value: a!defaultValue(
      fv!row[ recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.currentIterationCount],
      0
    ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created Count",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.createdCount,
      value: a!defaultValue(
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.createdCount],
      "–"
    ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Skipped Count",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.skippedCount,
      value: a!defaultValue(
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.skippedCount],
      "–"
    ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Parent Recon Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.parentReconId,
      value: a!defaultValue(
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.parentReconId],
      "–"
    ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Started By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.startedBy,
      value: a!defaultValue(
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.startedBy],
      "–"
    )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Started On",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.startedOn,
      value: if(
        isnull(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.startedOn]
        ),
        "–",
        datetext(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.startedOn],
          "default"
        )
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Completed On",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.completedOn,
      value: if(
        isnull(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.completedOn]
        ),
        "–",
        datetext(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.completedOn],
          "default"
        )
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Is Active",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      value: if(
        isnull(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive]
        ),
        "–",
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          value: if(
            fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive],
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
              icon: "check",
              altText: "Yes",
              color: "#138901"
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
              icon: "times",
              altText: "No",
              color: "SECONDARY"
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      align: "CENTER"
    )
  },
  pageSize: 50,
  borderStyle: "LIGHT",
  shadeAlternateRows: false
)

record_types.name: AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD
record_types.description: The table to hold information related to reconciliation requests to GSM
